Identity.Name: Herald Of Morale
Identity.Basic_Description: Priest in billowing robes, cloaked in a blue aura creating a wing like effect

Abilities.Name: Shield
Abilities.Ability: Once per turn as an action, Chose a target unit within 7 range of Herald of Celinta. Put a shield token on the unit. It gains +1 defense the next time it is attacked.

Abilities.Name: Instill
Abilities.Ability: Once per turn as an action, Chose a target unit within 7 range of Herald of Celinta. Put a instill token on the unit. It gains +1 strength the next time it is attacks.

Abilities.Name: Summon
Abilities.Ability: Once per turn, as an action Choose an allied unit anywhere on the map and roll a d20. On a roll of 10 or less move that unit adjacent to Herald of Spirit
